reference.Other Effects: Eliwood only.
Lyn only.
Lyn/Blade Lord/Myrmidon/Swordmaster only.

Targets foe's resistance.
At 2 range, counts as <:gba_light:1317240721136160858>Light magic under the Trinity of Magic and not as an sword under the weapon triangle, halves strength, cannot perform critical hits, and awards no weapon experience.

Restores (damage dealt) HP to the user.
Targets the foe's resistance.
Counts as <:gba_dark:1317240695580266506>Dark magic under the Trinity of Magic and not as an sword under the weapon triangle.
Cannot perform critical hits.
Awards no weapon experience.

uberspear.name: Uber Spear
uberspear.desc:
Grants +17 HP, +5 Strength, +4 Skill, +9 Speed, +4 Defense, +14 Resistance.
Doubles as ranged attack.

reference.Other Effects: Backfire rate: (31 - Luck)%
Athos only. Effective against Dragon units.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: Restores HP to allies in adjacent spaces.

reference.Other Effects: Healing calculation: (10 + Magic)

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc: Restores many HP to allies in adjacent spaces.

reference.Other Effects: Healing calculation: (20 + Magic)

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: Restores all HP to allies in adjacent spaces.

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc: Restores HP to allies at a distance.

reference.Other Effects: Healing calculation: (10 + Magic)

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: Restores HP to all allies in one area.

reference.Other Effects: Healing calculation: (10 + Magic)

restore.name: Restore
restore.desc: Returns allies to normal condition. (Cures sleep, etc.)

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc: Halts all enemy magic for several turns.

reference.Other Effects: Infliction rate: [30 + {[(Magic) - (Foe's Resistance)] × 5} + (Skill) - (distance from Foe × 2)]

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.desc: Puts enemies to sleep for several turns.

reference.Other Effects: Infliction rate: [30 + {[(Magic) - (Foe's Resistance)] × 5} + (Skill) - (distance from Foe × 2)]

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.desc: Sends enemies into a berserker rage.

reference.Other Effects: Infliction rate: [30 + {[(Magic) - (Foe's Resistance)] × 5} + (Skill) - (distance from Foe)]

warp.name: Warp
warp.desc: Moves allies in adjacent spaces instantly elsewhere.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: Moves allies from distant spaces to adjacent ones.

torch.name: Torch
torch.desc: A staff with burning pitch. Grows dimmer each turn.

reference.Other Effects: Increases vision in fog by 4 squares. Effect decreases by 1 each turn.

hammerne.name: Hammerne
hammerne.desc: Restores an adjacent ally's weapons to new condition.

unlock.name: Unlock
unlock.desc: Unlocks doors, even from a distance.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.desc: Increases magic resistance of adjacent allies briefly.

reference.Other Effects: Grants +7 Resistance to ally (effect lowers each turn).

dragonaxe.name: Dragon Axe
dragonaxe.desc: An axe designed to strike down wyverns.

angelicrobe.name: Angelic Robe
angelicrobe.desc: Increases HP by a max of 7 points. Vanishes after use.

energyring.name: Energy Ring
energyring.desc: Increases Mag or Str by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

secretbook.name: Secret Book
secretbook.desc: Increases Skill by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

speedwings.name: Speedwings
speedwings.desc: Increases speed by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

goddessicon.name: Goddess Icon
goddessicon.desc: Increases luck by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

dragonshield.name: Dragonshield
dragonshield.desc: Increases defense by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

talisman.name: Talisman
talisman.desc: Increases resistance by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

boots.name: Boots
boots.desc: Increases movement by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

bodyring.name: Body Ring
bodyring.desc: Increases constitution by 2 points. Vanishes after use.

herocrest.name: Hero Crest
herocrest.desc: For mercenaries, myrmidons, and fighters Lv. 10 and up.

knightcrest.name: Knight Crest
knightcrest.desc: For knights and cavaliers Lv. 10 and up.

orionsbolt.name: Orion's bolt
orionsbolt.desc: For archers and nomads Lv. 10 and up.

elysianwhip.name: Elysian Whip
elysianwhip.desc: For pegasus knights and wyvern riders Lv. 10 and up.

guidingring.name: Guiding Ring
guidingring.desc: For magic wielders and troubadors Lv. 10 and up.

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.desc: Opens doors and chests. Usable only by thieves.

elixir.name: Elixir
elixir.desc: A powerful solution that restores all HP.

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: A draught that boosts Res. Grows weaker each turn.

reference.Other Effects: Grants +7 Resistance (effect lowers each turn).

antitoxin.name: Antitoxin
antitoxin.desc: A medicinal solution that cures poison.

delphishield.name: Delphi Shield
delphishield.desc: An amulet of the god Delphi. Protects fliers from arrows.

membercard.name: Member Card
membercard.desc: If someone with this card stops in a suspicious space...

silvercard.name: Silver Card
silvercard.desc: A special card that reduces the cost of all items by half.

mine.name: Mine
mine.desc: A trap that damages units that step on it.

lightrune.name: Light Rune
lightrune.desc: A device that blocks units from entering spaces.

ironrune.name: Iron Rune
ironrune.desc: A device that negates enemy critical attacks.

fillasmight.name: Filla's Might
fillasmight.desc: A dance that increases allies' attack for a turn.

reference.Other Effects: Grants +10 Attack to one adjacent ally for one turn.

ninissgrace.name: Ninis's Grace
ninissgrace.desc: A dance that increases allies' defenses for a turn.

reference.Other Effects: Grants +10 Defense, +10 Resistance to one adjacent ally for one turn.

thorsire.name: Thor's Ire
thorsire.desc: A dance that increases critical hit % for a turn.

reference.Other Effects: Grants +10 Critical Rate to one adjacent ally for one turn.

setslitany.name: Set's Litany
setslitany.desc: A dance that increases allies' evasion for a turn.

reference.Other Effects: Grants +10 Avoid to one adjacent ally for one turn.
Eliwood only. Effective against Dragon units.
Hector only. Effective against Dragon units.
Effective against Dragon and Dark Druid units.

earthseal.name: Earth Seal
earthseal.desc: For some units above Lv. 10 who have not changed class.

afasdrops.name: Afa's Drops
afasdrops.desc: Gives a little treat to the unit that uses it.

reference.Other Effects: Increases all growth rates of an unit by 5%.

heavenseal.name: Heaven Seal
heavenseal.desc: For lords above Lv. 10 who have been deemed worthy.

emblemseal.name: Emblem Seal
emblemseal.desc:
Grants +10% Hit Rate, +10% Avoid.
Gives its carrier an advantage.

fellcontract.name: Fell Contract
fellcontract.desc: Awaiting the signature of a thief Lv. 10 or higher.

reference.Other Effects: Lyn only. Effective against Dragon units.
Hector only.

flametongue.name: Flametongue
flametongue.desc: Grants +10 Strength, +10 Skill, +20 Defense, +10 Resistance. Dragon's breath, which burns all it touches. There is no protection.

reference.Other Effects: For Mamukoot only!

reference.Mistranslation: Due to a mistranslation, the in-game description states that the Rienfleche can strike consecutively.

windsword.name: Wind Sword
windsword.desc: A magic sword capable of striking at a distance.

reference.Other Effects:
Effective against Flying units.
Targets foe's resistance.
At 2 range, counts as <:gba_anima:1317240651506651256>Anima magic under the Trinity of Magic and not as an sword under the weapon triangle, halves strength, cannot perform critical hits, and awards no weapon experience.

torchstaff.desc: Lights an area. The light grows weaker each turn.
